text.section:
Sec. 2-216. Powers.
The Miami-Dade County Industrial Development Authority shall have all the powers from time to time:
Conferred by, and incorporated by reference into, the enabling act, Part III of Chapter 159, Sections 159.44 through 159.53, Florida Statutes, as the same shall be amended from time to time; and
Otherwise granted under the laws of the State of Florida.
